Name: Aetherweaver
Story Background: A young mage who discovered the secrets of harnessing the power of the aether.
Ability: When Aetherweaver enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact or enchantment from your graveyard to your hand.
Appearance Description: Aetherweaver is cloaked in flowing robes adorned with intricate symbols of energy, with crackling arcs of aether energy emanating from their fingertips.
